general.matterCannonBlockDamage_comment: Enables the ability of the Matter Cannon to break blocks.
general.tinyTntBlockDamage_comment: Enables the ability of Tiny TNT to break blocks.
general.serverOpsIgnoreSecurity_comment: Server operators are not restricted by ME security terminal settings.
general.channels_comment: Changes the channel capacity that cables provide in AE2.
general.pathfindingStepsPerTick_comment: The number of pathfinding steps that are taken per tick and per grid that is booting. Lower numbers will mean booting takes longer, but less work is done per tick.

facades.allowBlockEntities_comment: Unsupported: Allows whitelisting block entities as facades. Could work, have render issues, or corrupt your world. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

craftingCPU.craftingSimulatedExtraction_comment: When true: simulate extraction of all the network's contents when starting a crafting job calculation. When false: use the cached available content list (same as terminals). Enabling might work a bit better, but it will significantly reduce performance.

crafting.inWorldSingularity_comment: Enable the in-world crafting of singularities.
crafting.inWorldFluix_comment: Enable the in-world crafting of fluix crystals.
crafting.inWorldCrystalGrowth_comment: Enable the in-world crafting of crystals.
crafting.disassemblyCrafting_comment: Enable shift-clicking with the crafting units in hand to disassemble them.

logging.chunkLoggerTrace_comment: Enable stack trace logging for the chunk loading debug command

battery.chargerChargeRate_comment: The chargers charging rate factor, which is applied to the charged items charge rate. 2 means it charges everything twice as fast. 0.5 half as fast.

worldGen.quartzOresBiomeBlacklist_comment: Biome IDs in which quartz ores should NOT be generated (i.e. minecraft:plains).

PortableCells.allowDisassembly_comment: Allow disassembly of portable cells into the recipe ingredients using shift+right-click

tickRates._comment: Min / Max Tickrates for dynamic ticking, most of these components also use sleeping, to prevent constant ticking, adjust with care, non standard rates are not supported or tested.

inWorldCrystalGrowth._comment: Settings for in-world growth of crystals.
inWorldCrystalGrowth.improvedFluidTag_comment: A fluid tag that identifies fluids that improve crystal growth speed. Does not affect growth with water/lava.
inWorldCrystalGrowth.improvedFluidMultiplier_comment: The speed multiplier to use when the crystals are submerged in the improved fluid.
